response.original_title: Hanya Ada Kedamaian di Balik Jendela Rumahku
response.overview: Dunya, a man living in a modest rented room, only wants to escape the stench that seeps through his window every time the neighborhood hosts a bird contest. To stop people from urinating there, he builds a fake grave complete with offerings to make it look sacred. But his small act of deception spirals into absurdity: the window becomes a revered site, offerings keep coming, the local economy begins to thrive, and the place evolves into an unexpected religious attraction beyond his control.
response.title: A Sanctuary For Nobody
